headline: Autonomous Last Mile Delivery Market Analysis Report 2026: Market to Reach $185.30 Billion by 2033 | Astute Analytica
summary: Rising urban e-commerce volumes, acute labor shortages in logistics, and growing demand for faster, contactless deliveries are fueling adoption of autonomous delivery robots and drones. North America leads the market with over 56% share, supported by strong technological infrastructure, regulatory backing, and the presence of major industry players like Amazon, FedEx, and Nuro.Chicago, Jan. 29, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The global autonomous last mile delivery market was valued at 30.05 billion i
